content:
I have updated the look and feel of the FHIR landing page in Confluence and have completed some of the updates based on the FMG review. For now, many pages still need to be reviewed and some may need to be archived, but I think the page looks a little better and easier to navigate. Hope you do too :) https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Product+Family

I would appreciate your review of the landing page and let me know if the pages fit better under a different section or if you have an idea for a sub-title of a given section.
